name: 天際酒店｜停車庫入口燈牌 Poster Design
description:
佛山天際酒店海報｜視覺效果設計


主用顏色多達 8 種，的確是一種巨大的挑戰。 

主要靈感來自住在酒店，眺望天際之上，你可以欣賞到一天 24 小時不同時段不同顏色的佛山天際線，8 種顏色代表 8 種完全不同的天空和情緒，上來即可體會。


Base on 8 colours from colourwheel, it's a big challenge for me to archive this poster.

Check the layer ‘Grids’ for more composting redesign.

Let's press "Like❤️" button. I will enlarge or update my design file anytime and you will see and duplicate it. No bad, right?


Booking Link: https://tinyurl.com/yefoc44j
